content: catventurous crochet simple and fun crochet patterns the #fashionablycatventurous supermeowdel catventurer melba @catventurepussmelba welcome to this beginner-friendly video tutorial for our jasmine stitch cat ball toy thanks so much for watching and happy crocheting materials * yarn of your choice i used 4 weight recycled cotton free from harmful substances * crochet hook 1 - 2 sizes larger than recommended for your yarn * second crochet hook of approximately the same size or smaller * darning needle * scissors * stuffing optional * bell optional * catnip or valerian optional stitches/techniques 2 45 * slip knot onto hook * making a chain * chain st chain * puff * slip_stitch sl st * basic hand sewing techniques * weaving in ends
